contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
PAPADAKOS, J., files a dissenting opinion.
Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designátion as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
